Description:
Required skills to be successful:Communication: Needs to have the ability to communicate clearly and effectively, both verbal and written.
Relationship building: Needs to have the ability to build and maintain friendly, warm relationships or networks of contacts with the principals.
Interpersonal Understanding: Needs to understand other people and have cross-cultural sensitivity.
Flexibility: Should have the ability to adapt to and work effectively with a variety of situations, individuals or groups. Needs to understand and appreciate different opposing perspectives on an issue, to adapt an approach as the requirements of a situation change. About the team:Working in a fast-paced and diverse environment, and reporting directly to the Parts Material & Inventory ManagerWhat equips you for the role:Engineering Graduate/ Diploma holder in a technical field.Job Details
